name: invincibility
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being impossible to defeat or prevent from doing what is intended: The crisis has shattered the government's apparent invincibility. Today's young people are certain of their own invincibility. See
invincible
More examplesFewer examplesThey have a strong sense of their political security and military invincibility.He has that air of invincibility surrounding him.The nation has built up an image of economic invincibility.
